articles.title: Asus Vivobook Go 14 (2023) review - News9 LIVE
articles.description: Asus Vivobook Go 14 (2023) review: Classic variant’s power in a lightweight frame
articles.content: Performance: The laptop features a Ryzen 5 7530U processor, AMD Radeon graphics, 8 GB LPDDR5 RAM, and 512 GB PCIe 3.0 SSD storage and can handle everyday office tasks with ease.
